text: #COVID19 #ScamAlert Getting emails + texts, asking for completion of a limited-time #survey on the #Pfizer #Moderna, or #AstraZeneca #vaccine? No #legit survey asks for #CreditCard / bank info to get a “free” #reward - that's #Bogus! https://t.co/u2HiXmqSIq @pbcgov @pbclibrary https://t.co/gYxLBmvds9
